ComicInfo.Summary: The Puritans, a highly technologically advanced organization out to eliminate all Kherubim and Daemonites from the planet, plan to rewrite history. If the WildC.A.T.s want to continue to exist they'll have to follow Gina and her elite strike team on a dangerous trek back through time. First stop...smack dab in the middle of World War I. "Recruitment!" Story by Brandon Choi. Art by Carlos D'Anda. Get a look at how the Puritans recruited some of the highly skilled operatives.
ComicInfo.Title: Endangered Species, Part. 1 : For Whom the Bell Tolls...! / Recruitment
